responses.rationale: The segment describes how bird flu spreads but contains no minimiser or scale contrast for reassurance.
The segment compares the number of birds slaughtered this year to last year but lacks a minimiser token ('only', 'just', etc.) combined with a scale contrast.
The segment provides a comparison of numbers but lacks a minimiser token ('only', 'just', etc.) combined with a scale contrast.
The segment describes how the virus spreads and mutates but contains no minimiser or scale contrast for reassurance.
The segment states it is hard to keep the virus out but contains no minimiser or scale contrast for reassurance.
The segment describes where cases are appearing but contains no minimiser or scale contrast for reassurance.
